assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gallantt Ispat Limited manufactures and sells iron and steel, and agro products under the Gallantt brand name in India. The company operates through Steel, Power, Agro, and Real Estate segments. It offers sponge iron; mild steel billets; re-rolled products, such as TMT bars; and wheat flour products comprising atta, suji, maida, and bran. The company also engages in the real estate business. Gallantt Ispat Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Gorakhpur, India.
